SA11bsa035_u:3_1: yaśca pūrvajanmasu mahāyānabhāvukaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsārasunirviṇṇacittaḥ maraṇānusmṛtikaśca samastabāhyādhyātmika-vastusvalpābhiniveśaḥ,
SA11bsa035_u:3_2_0: 'ekasatkalyāṇamitrata ekāviparyastamārgaśravaṇe kiṃ na syāt? ahamekaṃ santaṃ anveṣyāmi' - evaṃ cintayan saḥ kalyāṇamitrānurupaṃ
SA11bsa035_u:3_4: sadadhyāśayaḥ, māyāśāṭhyarahitabodhiprasthānamahācittoḥ bodhisattvaśīlasya triśikṣāṃ suṣṭhu gṛhṇīyāt /
SA11bsa035_u:3_5: tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād ahorātraṃ kāya-vāk-cittasamastakarmāṇi na vyarthāni bhavanti /
SA11bsa035_u:4_2: aharniśaṃ yogañca āpādayet / tataḥ śvāsapraśvāsamapi parārtham abhilaṣitukāmaḥ saḥ pañcamaprahara utthāya,
SA11bsa035_u:4_5: triratnapratimāsamakṣaṃ sulipya sugandhapuṣpaprakaraṃ suvikīrya tadagrato bhūmau jānunī saṃsthāpya,
SA11bsa035_u:4_6: kṛtāñjaliḥ daśadiglokadhāta-samastabuddha-samastadharmamahāyānasaṃghasamakṣaṃ ca asaṃkhyānirvācyakāyavyūhān nirmāya teṣāñcaikaikam caraṇayoḥ supraṇamet /
SA11bsa035_u:4_8: tataḥ pratikāyaṃ anirvacanīyamukhāni pratimukhaṃ cānirvacanīyajihvā nirmāya,
SA11bsa035_u:4_9: svaparapāpān aśeṣān diśet / svaparapuṇyāni cānumodayet / aciram abhisambodhiprāptān buddhān bhagavato dharmacakrapravartanāya adhyeṣayet /
SA11bsa035_u:4_10: ye dharmacakraṃ pravartya āyuḥ saṃskārān parijihīrṣante,
SA11bsa035_u:4_13: yathā sūtre āgatāni tathā pratyaṅgapadāni savistaraṃ paṭhet /
SA11bsa035_u:5_0: tataḥ saptapūjānantaraṃ sarvasattvān avalambya triśaraṇagamanapadāni triḥ paṭhet /
SA11bsa035_u:5_1: tataḥ bodhicittamutpādayet, yathā vidhau prāpyate tathā ca kuryāt /
SA11bsa035_u:7_0: tataḥ svakāyārpaṇaṃ, tataḥ mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ dharmanaye mahārathināṃ ca mārge avasthānāya pratijānīyāt /
SA11bsa035_u:7_1: tataḥ svaśayyāyāṃ paryaṅkamābhujya gurubhaṭṭāraka-śrī-bodhibhadrakṛta-samādhi-(sambhāra) parivarttoktāninavāṅgāni jñātvā śamathavipaśyanāyogaṃ bhāvayet /
SA11bsa035_u:8_1: aho! āścaryam / ākāśopamānutpādataḥ pratītyasamutpādabalena nānābhāseyamavasthitiḥ ayam' aho! āścaryam' iti vicintya aṣṭamāyopamarupeṇa jānīyāt /
SA11bsa035_u:8_2: tato mahākaruṇacittena samastādṛśyasattvebhyo dharmadeśanārtha yathābodhi mahāyāna-sūtrapāṭhaṃ kuryāt /
SA11bsa035_u:8_3: tataḥ bhojanāvasare- 'ṣaṭtriṃśadaśuciparipūrṇena asāreṇa nāśaparyavasitena kāyenānena tadbuddhadharmakāya-sāramanveṣayāmi' iti vicintya na puṣṭyartha,
SA11bsa035_u:11_0: tataḥ pūrvāhṇayāmeṣvapi pañcamaprahare yathoktavat sarvaṃ kāryam /
SA11bsa035_u:11_1: madhyāhne sandhyāyāṃ rātreḥ prathame madhye ca yāme sarvathā yathoktāḥ sarve vidhayaḥ pūrayitavyāḥ /
SA11bsa035_u:12_0: evaṃ teṣāṃ ṣaḍyāmānām aṣṭādaśadhā vibhāge kṛte sati catuḥpañcāśatkṣaṇā bhaviṣyanti /
SA11bsa035_u:12_1: bodhisattvā api uttamamadhyamā ('dhamāḥ) nava syuḥ / gurupadeśataḥ
SA11bsa035_u:13_0: śreṣṭhaiḥ samākhyātatamaṃ sumārga bodhiprabhādyaiḥ kalitaśca śiṣyaiḥ /
SA11bsa035_u:13_1: gattvā mahāyānakulābhijātaiḥ prāpyaṃ padaṃ tad dvipadendrakasya // 4 //
SA11bsa035_u:16_0: tenaiva paṇḍitena lokacakṣuṣā ca jayaśīlena anūditā //
